website_summaries.verdict: Another new monitor and another win for ViewSonic, the Elite XG270 shares much of its DNA with the Editors' Choice XG270QG, and helps to move the entire category of gaming displays forward with screaming speeds and beautiful picture quality.
pros: Blazing fast 240Hz refresh rate on an IPS panel
Low motion blur and input lag

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Come a long way since my last high refresh rate monitor, GSYNC with HDR and 240hz? Perfect! Except you can't adjust the screen brightness with HDR on Their application for adjusting settings is clunky and their on screen menu is quite basic (compared to my older BenQ) The speakers are actually not that bad either
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: A BEAST OF A MONITOR
customer_reviews.text: From coming from a 60hz monitor without Gsync this thing is absolutely amazing. The 240hz makes everything feel absolutely buttery smooth and the Gsync makes games feel way better than it should it honestly makes you feel like you are cheating. The IPS display makes the colours pop. The included ‘blinds’ definitely helps with glare from sunlight. 10/10 I would recommend to people who are looking for a 240hz monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's so close to a 5 star monitor. In games, near perfect. Only issue I've had with it is any off angle view vertically results in weird shadowing around corners. Other than that, it's absolutely fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Brazil

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for gamers
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product as my son is a gamer and he loves this
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Mistakes were made.
customer_reviews.text: So I was going to get the XG2402 model and I saw this was just released. Basically RGB and says Elite. This is not Elite by any means. The writing on the monitor is smeared. Also there is backlight bleed on a tn panel... stay far away my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Derek S.

customer_reviews.title: XG350R-C 35" ultrawide monitor
customer_reviews.text: So after a couple days calibrating it to my liking, I'm surprised how amazing games and movies look on it. G-sync works well and so does HDR (though I leave it off for realistic colors). No dead pixels or lines anywhere on my screen. The speakers are loud and audio is better than expected. The only bad thing I can point out is the base stand takes half my desk, making the monitor way too close to me. I would recommend getting a vesa mount to save your eyeballs from exploding.
customer_reviews.author: Tai  Co

customer_reviews.title: Hybrid gaming monitor!
customer_reviews.text: So, this is what I would consider a hybrid between a gaming monitor and a "Entertainment screen". It gets very bright, the colors are beautiful, 1440p is gorgeous here, a very nice panel. It has some smearing on its default image settings, but no input lag. That's where "PureXP" comes in. Turn that in, the image gets a lot darker but it turns into a TN panel with no smearing at all. (artificially of course, and lower brightness) but you use that for gaming and the normal for anything else and this thing is FUN. Great purchase. There are so many settings, and there's even software for it. Metal stand, overall a great product. for this price its GREAT
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for sending me an already returned and dead monitor! (EDIT)
customer_reviews.text: Paid $716 for a 1440p monitor, when it got here I knew something was instantly wrong. The packaging didn't look right, but had the manufacturer seal. It came dead on arrival. I spent 2 hours, installed the drivers and everything. Computer detected it, but display did not turn on. This was my first experience with Viewsonic, and it will also be my last. I'll be going and buying an Asus now. *EDIT* I refunded the monitor and they KEPT THE TAXES I PAID ON IT!!! I paid $716.65 after taxes and was only refunded $658.99 (no restocking fee). AVOID THIS COMPANY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin D.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of backlight bleed, was shipped used instead of new.
customer_reviews.text: The backlight bleed is insane, nearly the entire screen is bleeding I am attaching a photo. I also paid for a new monitor and the one I got was clearly used as packaging was damaged or missing, deep scrapes on the base stand as well as scrapes on the back panel where RGB connects shows signs of heavy use. Buyer beware you might be getting a very used monitor. Will upload photo later for some reason it's blocking it.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Hammock

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, contrast, and brightness. Lots of settings options. Has everything and more
customer_reviews.text: This Monitor is a beast. After many hours of comparing other well known monitors I finally bit the bullet on this one. Its bright at 550 nits, great contrast, HDR and 2k up to 165hz its pretty amazing to play on. Its buttery smooth, and looks really great. The Curve of the screen makes it seem bigger and easier to see. Its got everything I was looking for and more. Its super customizable for the setting too, and all the extra ports available is a nice. You cant go wrong with this monitor. Im absolutely pleased with my purchase. Looks better than my Samsung 4k hdr tv.
customer_reviews.author: TTBUG

customer_reviews.title: G-sync Issues
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 5 stars if it worked better with G-sync. It's in need of a firmware upgrade from the looks of it since PureXP isn't working yet. Wish the RGB worked with ASUS Aura, hate running multiple controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Cossette

customer_reviews.title: incredible image
customer_reviews.text: just wanted to let know people that probably have doubts buying this monitor, do it, worth every single penny; very good picture quality, no dead pixel or backlight problem, very easy to setup and use, and the built in speakers are a great surprise, i wouldnt thought it would be that good.
customer_reviews.author: Jair E. Atusparia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing monitor! Read review
customer_reviews.text: Super super bright. User friendly. quality materials. No dead pixels for me, thank god! Speakers are of high quality and loud!!! The only con is the stand, its metallic, great quality but its so damn big. It nearly takes half of my desk's width, and my desk is pretty large. Everything else is amazing so far! Edit: No dead pixels but pretty bad backlight bleed. Amazon is sending me a replacement already. Let’s see how this works Edit: New one arrived better but had some insignificant backlight bleed, very acceptable for MVA panel in my opinion. Amazon support was amazing
customer_reviews.author: Alon Yahav

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor, but I was definitely sent a returned display
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened my display I could tell that it wasn't "brand new". The way it was wrapped up, and inspection of the screws, etc... you could see that someone had this monitor before. However, it seems to be working fine. Monitor is excellent overall. I am VERY pleased with my gaming experience on it, and also the color reproduction. I do graphic design for a living, and this monitor is just fine for my needs there as well. Happy with the purchase, but not happy in the order I was sent.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor, but the pixel policy is bad for the premium pricing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor and have enjoyed the features immensely. The HDR was nice and the G SYNC smooth, but over the course of last month I have developed a dead pixel. Here where the tricky part is. I looked up their dead pixel policy for the warranty and saw that they only cover the monitor if you develop 3 or more dead pixels. For that case I would recommend something else if you want a monitor unless you are willing to buy a third party warranty.
customer_reviews.author: salvador

customer_reviews.title: A nice monitor.  A good upgrade over my prior.
customer_reviews.text: G-sync is awesome. Colors are super vibrant. Thus was a big step up from my 60hz TN 22 inch prior display. I have one small light bleed on bottom of screen (approx 2" long by 1/2"). Turning down brightness to 50% essentially eliminated it. There is some ips glow when screen looked at off angle.. Contrast is not the best, but that's to be expected on an ips display. The stand is super well built and stable. I do not use the built in speakers or the rgb lighting. Running a Gigabyte Aurous Z390 Ultra MB, I7 9700K and RTX-2080 super.
customer_reviews.author: Rich M.

customer_reviews.title: Buy there other new monitor they screwed this one up
customer_reviews.text: Terrible picture quality read the reviews on other sites and match what you see when you test this monitor. You get to see a line that crosses the monitor in the middle. Corner of monitor has color bleed. There seems to be a lag issue monitor gets fuzzy and out of sync on images when you moved side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Silvano

customer_reviews.title: How did I live?
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this monitor is amazballs! It's my first 21:9 monitor, and it's a game changer. It doesn't get top marks in every area, but it scores solidly IMO. Sure, some have higher refresh rates, or resolution, or any of the others. This also costs much less than those, and has been great to me so far. I have no need for a second one, but I'd buy another one if I had the need. It's worth checking out.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Chalupa

customer_reviews.title: The best IPS for gaming but still not as good as the best TN
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I prefer the IQ of IPS of course, but as a gaming monitor only, I was not happy with the quality of it vs my TN. IPS is surely improving and this one is the best but still cannot touch the best TNs like my XF272. Also, had some weird sync issues that will make me reboot the computer to fix, very annoying. Plus no matter how I tried (and yes using the right app), I never got the upgrade option.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gabriel G.

customer_reviews.title: Great tech
customer_reviews.text: Decided on this monitor because it fit everything I was looking for. If you get lucky the monitor will be great, but for me it took 3 tries. The first panel had extreme blb. The second unit seemed better but the monitor casing was not assembled correctly and you could see inside the monitor from the side due to a gap. Third unit seems good. Still some blb but it's ok for me and the quality seems ok. Overall the picture quality and tech is there but viewsonic qc doesnt seem very good.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really good picture quality. I also have a 27" Omen monitor. They are going for about the same price right now. This one has much better picture quality and I believe part of the reason is due to the fact that it is 10bit, where as the omen is only 8bit if im not mistaken. You Definitely want to research it first.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Super wide screen
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the performance of this Viewsonic monitor. For gaming the ultra-wide view is amazing, I can see more and even get peripheral vision ques from Farcry 5! For productivity this is wonderful, I can have 3 usable windows open side by side, for coding this a huge help. The color and 100Hz refresh rate is great. it even supports HDR10 high contrast for games. This is my 3rd Viewsonic, and they have yet to let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for gaming, and wow! Picture looks fantastic, sound is great for monitor speakers! Just started using it but am very happy so far, will update if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Fred A Cnota

customer_reviews.title: One of the better monitors I've used!
customer_reviews.text: I've been to a few video game conventions and when I've seen those curved monitors with really nice picture quality, I have always wanted one. Thankfully, I was able to afford one and after some thorough work, I was able to find this well priced and reviewed monitor. I've had it for a few months, but it's been serving me VERY well! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Martineau

customer_reviews.title: Love the Stand Design and IPS Panel!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a family member, heard nothing but compliments on the stand design, especially the RGB. He needed it to be IPS and G-SYNC so the specs on this model made sense. The colors on this panel pop too!
customer_reviews.author: KY

customer_reviews.title: i frag now :D
customer_reviews.text: bought for my first build close to a year ago, no problems or blips whatsoever from installation to now! i've tried many different games and watched several movies, refresh rate functions as promised and colors look great. no bleeding, no dead pixels, no smearing. honestly, i only spent the extra money on this model over viewsonic's xg2402 for the simplicity of the monitor's base (no red strip, no big logos)--for me, that aesthetic element is worth the extra ~$40 (at the time of purchase). otherwise, functionally, i'm sure i would've been satisfied with one of their slightly cheaper models. regardless i'm super happy with him :)
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Worst volume
customer_reviews.text: The volume from my cell phone is louder than this monitor. If you want to hear anything with this monitor like music or a podcast forget it. Would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: SAR

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but the best of its class
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor with minimal backlight bleed. I write this review after purchasing two asus pg279qs and one pg279qz that were all plagued with unacceptable levels of blb. If you're looking for an updated 1440p 165hz gsync panel this is the best option as of feb 1, 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Gaming Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this monitor to replace a 7 year old Dell (60Hz, slow response time, etc.). I cannot overstate how much better this monitor is compared to older technology. Even scrolling through a website, the higher refresh rate made a difference. Gaming (CS:Go & Apex so far) is ridiculously smooth, and the free sync works great. This is a perfect "budget" entry into gaming monitors, especially if you are coming from older generation panels.
customer_reviews.author: Nick H

customer_reviews.title: Budget Gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this monitor and let me tell you, it does not disappoint. I play PC, Switch, and PS4 on the monitor and haven't went back to a TV. Why? The refresh rate. The response you get from a controller or mouse click is faster than using a TV. The speakers are decent, but they work, so there's that. The RGB is negligible. But that's not why I bought this. 5/5 Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift. They love it and said, “this may make me a pro gamer”. I don’t think it worked out quite like they thought it would but the refresh rate is awesome and the colors are vibrant. The only thing is (probably a user error) is that the back lighting color can’t be changed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Migita

customer_reviews.title: It is really good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good monitor, it replaces an old and quite bad monitor. So My review it quite positive. The USB ports are useful for my webcam and my microphone. The speakers are quite weak but good enough for light background music, but not enough phone for dialogue or watching TV. I don't care about the RGB because it faces a wall and I don't see it. I have less problem with my dry eyes with this screen. As for the picture, I think it is quite good, but I am not a professional.
customer_reviews.author: Bertrand Pigeon

customer_reviews.title: Still too much backlight bleed with current gen IPS displays
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately had to send mine back due to what I considered to be excessive backlight bleed/IPS glow for a premium display. I get that this is inherent to this type of display technology but there should be better QC or some sort of fix so that one doesn’t have to play the panel lottery. Otherwise the monitor looks really nice with thin bezels, a very robust stand and RGB lighting. Currently, the only option if you want all the new super fast display technology with an actual G-Sync module built in.
customer_reviews.author: Techie24

customer_reviews.title: My all-time favorite monitor to date!
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my Dell 144hz Gsync because it started getting flickery after a couple years of use. This ViewSonic Elite is notably better across the board. I've been using it for a while and wanted to wait to put some miles on it before i left a review. Worth it! I highly recommend! Getting a good gsync-rated monitor with no issues is not easy these days and this one is tops!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: Great Response in games Now
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST monitor I have by far! excellent response now , when before my "actions" didn't appear to work at times!! The 1080 X 1920 resolution makes less work for my graphics card as an air intake fan doesn't cycle higher anymore at all!! and I have a RTX2080Ti with a i9-9900K. 240Hz is a pleasure, now I know what I was missing in past!
customer_reviews.author: Guy T Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking monitor, smooth motion handling, horrendous backlight bleed
customer_reviews.text: I got mine delivered on Jan 17th 2020 and immediately upon turning on the monitor, it was backlight bleed city. One area in particular, the upper left region as you can see in the photo, had a cloud stain that was shaped like the African continent. I could see it on darker shades of red, blue, green, gray, not only black. For $650 with tax and shipping, this is unacceptable, otherwise the GSYNC is amazing, colors pop, very sturdy stand, swivel is great, joystick is garbage and doesn't recognize presses half the time, the RGB is disappointing to say the least as its only faint blue or rainbow and non-addressable.
customer_reviews.author: Suelem Toniolo

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I don't regret spending $600 for this monitor this thing have an amazing color,brightness and gaming 1440P 1ms 144hz have everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Felix

customer_reviews.title: Better than the competition.
customer_reviews.text: Tried out two different monitors with similar specs IPS 240 hz, this is by far the best out of them all! I didn't think IPS could handle 240 hz after getting testing and returning the other two monitors from other brands, but this is truly a great monitor and blurb busters approved!
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: best in the price range
customer_reviews.text: as excellent as this monitor is, it’s hard to recommend over the lg 27GL850-B 27" if you don’t care about having full gsync support. that being said, this monitor is near perfect and mine came without any backlight bleed or issues of any kind. the rgb is unnecessary imo but if that’s a feature you want it’s there and functional. well built and very sturdy with a lot of adjustment options. there’s also no cringe gamer red and black transformers aesthetics to be found on this monitor and that alone is worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: to amazon box came damaged. Opened up and set up monitor. If all goes well will be happy. I love the monitor but am very unhappy about the condition of box, should for the amount of money been put in a box big enough to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do more than 1920 x 1080.
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback is that it only does 1920 x 1080 but that's fine for my laptop that has a Nvidia 1070 in it. I kinda want another one so that I can get more screen display. As for gaming, it's freaking great -- much easier to play computer games on it compared to my old 17" laptop screen.
customer_reviews.author: ManilaRice

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is stunning. I really like the LED’s on the bottom. I used it with a VESA mount and it was very easy to set up. It came in a big box with good packing.
customer_reviews.author: David Ogletree

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a monitor for use working remotely and watching videos, TV, etc.. It has an exceptional picture and I like te adjustable stand. The refresh rate gives me a crisp clear picture and it's easy to change between devices.
customer_reviews.author: ObxRebel

customer_reviews.title: True gsync for under a $1k
customer_reviews.text: In a sea of 1440p IPS monitors, this has to be the best monitor for the money hands down. True gsync makes a huge diff rather than gsync compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Backlight bleed
customer_reviews.text: 3 distinct spots on the lower edge of the monitor, like have circles of light.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor, just turn down the Brightness
customer_reviews.text: Got his monitor after my old 23" Viewsonic Monitor died from old age (BTW, I loved that monitor and would still be using if it hadn't died). Monitor has been fantastic with great picture. The ONLY issue I had with the monitor is that they default the monitor brightness level to a very uncomfortable 100% level. I had to turn the brightness down to 20 and the contract down to 70 for it not to hurt my eyes from the blast of white light. After those changes, the monitor has been a delight
customer_reviews.author: Gordon F. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and design
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day for both working and gaming. I like everything about it except it is a little bit expensive for me. But I don't regret the second I assemble it up and use it. The lighting is super cool. Also, the menu bottom is well designed: you can choose all options with a single swirling button located at the center below the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal picture and tuned for gaming, what more could you ask for? I've only had it a week, so I'll update this review as needed, but right now I'd very much recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bo-bandy

customer_reviews.title: Monitor shuts off randomly in 3 second increments
customer_reviews.text: I think it has something to do with the g sync compatible software, I'll be playing a game and the screen will go black at random intervals for seconds. Super annoying and what a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Monitor For The Price... When It Works
customer_reviews.text: The monitor failed less than a week after recieving it, as it will no longer turn on. When it work, it was nice. Had some harsh ghosting, but I could look past it because of the color levels. Brightness was excessive, but that is just preference. Took some time figuring out how to turn on 100hz refresh rate, as it was something that had to be turned on in Windows setting. After half an hour of calibrating it. The image quality looked great. Its unfortunate that mine no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: Kremit Frog

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor!!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is pure gold. Color is great and the monitor works great at 240hz 1ms settings. My only issue is when tabing out of game to use second monitor is has a 2 second black screen when clicking back to the main screen. A little annoying but my only issue. Besides that I am loving this screen for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Montiel

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME monitor...best FPS gaming monitor I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This 27" IPS panel is the best monitor I have ever used. Better than ASUS. Better than BenQ. It is fast, clear, and easy to setup. 100% recommend this to ANY gamer - especially FPS gamers
customer_reviews.author: Fubar22

customer_reviews.title: One of few Gaming Monitor can work with ConnectPRO DP KVM switch
customer_reviews.text: We tested many 2560x1440 @144Hz monitors with ConnectPRO DisplayPort KVM switch lines. This monitor is one of very few monitors without any issues. It provides very stable refreshing rate and fast switching responding time with ConnectPRO Fastest DIsplayPort KVM switches.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Wu

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I was a little sketchy with monitor, but it really impressed me. One of the best monitor for your buck. it really makes 1440p look amazing. Colors are really good right out of the box. The stand is really solid and steady. Overall best monitor u can get for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this when it was released, by far the best all-around monitor in the market. Just pull the trigger and buy it!
customer_reviews.author: john p.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful display
customer_reviews.text: First time upgrading to a UHD resolution, and I chose Viewsonic's because someone told me it was good for editing. I use this monitor for Photoshop, lightroom, premiere and aftereffects. For games I play COD and other games that can do UHD and I love it. The size of the monitor and the curve are perfect that you don't even notice the curve, you just get immersed in whatever you're doing.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: It's alright.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this monitor. First 1440p and I heard good things about it, however when it arrived and I turned it on, it had a horrible yellow tint to it. I adjusted some of the settings and downloaded an ICC profile to try to fix it but it was still there. There is BLB / IPS glow as well. Aside from that, the picture quality is top notch and the response times don't hinder gaming at all. Maybe I just got unlucky with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing no matter what game I am playing! The settings are pretty customizable too!
customer_reviews.author: Ambitious Cat Geek

customer_reviews.title: 2 Tries but still no good
customer_reviews.text: First one I ordered had horrible back light bleeding and ips glow. Sent that back and the replacement one was just as bad if not worse.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C.

customer_reviews.title: My setup finally reached completion!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is everything it's advertised to be. I just have to calibrate some of the colors upon setting up, but I know it's going to look amazing once I do. Great job Viewsonic!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Good gaming monitor.
customer_reviews.text: 2k 165hz G-sync nano ips, it is a very decent gaming monitor. If you like playing pc gaming, it will be a very good choice for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tengfei P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gaming experience
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor, no complaints. Best 35 inch wide screen available at that price.. Does just as great for work and productivity as well. It’s width is basically like having dual monitors without the annoying bezel.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A. Herman

customer_reviews.title: High quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for level of quality. Excellent picture for everyday use and for gaming. Connected to an Nvidia 2600 RTX video card.
customer_reviews.author: Wion

customer_reviews.title: Super fast! Responsive.. What a steal!
customer_reviews.text: I instantly put this monitor to work! Ah man it feels good.. the games, So smooth and fluid.. the picture quality and the view angles perfect!! It must have monitor.. a great buy compare to its competitors! What a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Ports and FreeSync
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming monitor. I wanted something that did 144hz with two HDMI inputs... which is a pretty hard bill to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzz Ears

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as you'd expect. It is amazing in every regard of the word. Just note that it is a g-sync monitor, so it will not go above 60 fps if you use an HDMI cable so make sure you can use Display Port with your device if you want higher than 60fps.
customer_reviews.author: mahnaz zahedi

customer_reviews.title: Screen is great, but doesn't work with a VESA mount
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the quality of the screen, but as you can see in the photo, the opening is the back is not large enough to fit the entire VESA mount.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor especially for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Adjusted from a 4k 60hz monitor to this, and I must say the transition is a welcome one. The display doesn't have any noticeable delay, and although the colors were a bit off from the box, I adjusted the colors to my liking and found the colors to be very vibrant even for a TN panel.
customer_reviews.author: John Goga

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, mostly use for work. The base is a bit bulky, but good overall.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Messenger

customer_reviews.title: It's big and a bit heavy but looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Use it for sim racing and it works great! I had to take the stand off and use longer screws. Other than that no problems.
customer_reviews.author: igmeman

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor With Crisp Image
customer_reviews.text: Viewsonic's high-end monitors have always been top-of-the-line in quality, finish, and performance. Even at the highest refresh rate, the image is crisp and clear. Very versatile and superb functionality for extreme gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Mo S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor! Worth The Money!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this monitor! Absolutely perfect for console and PC! I even reviewed it on YouTube!
customer_reviews.author: C. Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Bright Sharp Image
customer_reviews.text: Love the monitor so far. I run it at 144Hz. Looks damn good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor and best price. 144hz gsync and 1440 p what more can you ask for . The color are really good . Gaming is awesome with this monitor. Keep in mind you’ll need the hardware to ru it at 1440p
